Release notes:

Implementation of interfaces IPagedDAO, and IPagedDAO<TEntity, TKey>:

-	The follow methods were deprecated and removed from interfaces IPagedDAO, and IPagedDAO<TEntity, TKey>:	
	-	IPagedResult<TEntity> GetPagedResult(int startIndex, int pageSize, IQueryable<TEntity> query);
	-	IPagedResult<TEntity> GetIndexPagedResult(int pageIndex, int pageSize, IQueryable<TEntity> query);
	
New implementation for the following method:
    -   bool Exists<TEntity>(Expression<Func<TEntity, bool>> predicate) where TEntity : class
    
    this method is defined on IQueryableDAO and IQueryableDAO<TEntity, TKey>.


That's All.
